column5: Anyone have information on Boat rentals around pigeon lake? My buddy is looking to rent a boat this summer in the area. Thanks for any info possible.

I'm sure most of the resorts on the lake will have rentals. I'll ask around and see if I can find some names for you of some more.  Here is some of the resorts that does have them.  Click here  another  Mike
Buckeye marina also rents boats. Right in bobcaygeon.
A buddy would lend them their boat.
Thanks Guys and Ahhh no to that Boston.
